properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Pt. St. George to Cape Mendocino CA out 10 nm
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 14 at 3:02PM PST until January 15 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Eureka CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, southwest winds 10 to 20
kt with gusts up to 30 kt and seas 9 to 13 feet. For the Gale
Watch, south winds 25 to 35 kt with gusts up to 50 kt and seas
11 to 16 feet possible.

* WHERE...Pt St George to Cape Mendocino out 10 nm.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 10 AM to 10 PM PST
Wednesday. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 6 AM PST
Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM PST WEDNESDAY... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 10 PM PST WEDNESDAY
